traits.name: Altruist
traits.desc: Altruists heal the lowest Health ally for 15% of damage they deal. Your team gains Armor and Magic Resist.

traits.name: Arcanist
traits.desc: Arcanists gain Ability Power and grant Ability Power to allies.

tiers.desc: 50 AP for Arcanists; 20 AP for others
90 AP for Arcanists; 50 AP for others
135 AP for Arcanists; 135 AP for others

The Artist paints the champion you place in a special bench slot. Get a 1-star copy of the champion placed there when the Artist's work is complete.

Rounds to Complete = Unit Cost

traits.name: Behemoth
traits.desc: Behemoths gain increased Armor and Magic Resist. Whenever a Behemoth dies, the nearest Behemoth gains 50% more for 8 seconds.

traits.name: Bruiser
traits.desc: Your team gains 100 maximum Health. Bruisers gain additional maximum Health.

tiers.desc: 80% Health; Every 3 seconds, Bruisers deal 6% HP bonus physical damage on their next attack.

traits.name: Dragonlord
traits.desc: After 8 seconds of combat, the Dragon strikes the board, dealing true damage to enemies and granting all allies Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

tiers.desc: 10% HP damage and Stuns for 1.5 seconds.

traits.name: Dryad
traits.desc: Dryads gain Ability Power and 150 Health. Each enemy death grants permanent additional Health.

traits.name: Duelist
traits.desc: Duelists gain Attack Speed on each attack, stacking up to 12 times.

traits.name: Exalted
traits.desc:
Your team gains 7% bonus damage, plus more based on your level.

After combat, store XP in a Soul Core. Sell the Core to claim the XP.

Each game a different set of units is Exalted.

traits.name: Fated
traits.desc: Hover one Fated unit over another to form a pair and unlock a Fated Bonus. Your pair gains 20% HP.

tiers.desc: All Fated champions get 200% of the Fated Bonus
All Fated champions get 300% of the Fated Bonus
All Fated champions gain 300% of EVERY Fated Bonus

traits.name: Fortune
traits.desc:
When you lose a fight, gain Luck. The more fights in a row you lose, the more Luck you get.

Lose Luck when you win.

tiers.desc: Roll a die; in that many player combats, hold a Festival! At the Festival, you have the option to convert your Luck into rewards.
Heal 2 player health at the start of each player combat.
Fortune smiles! Gain extra rewards and more luck every turn no matter what, and hold a Festival every turn.

traits.name: Ghostly
traits.desc:
Upon dealing or taking damage 5 times, Ghostly units send 2 spectres to haunt nearby enemies and heal 2% max Health every 2 seconds.

Haunted enemies take bonus damage for each spectre on them, and pass spectres on death.

tiers.desc: Every 3 casts, Wukong grows his weapon, modifying his Abilities.

traits.name: Heavenly
traits.desc:
Heavenly units grant unique stats to your team, increased for each Heavenly unit in play.
Heavenly units gain 70% more.

Kha'Zix - +10% Crit chance
Malphite - +8 AR/MR
Neeko - +60 HP
Qiyana - +10% AD
Soraka - +10% AP
Wukong - +10% AS
Emblem - +5% Omnivamp

2-stars grant 30% more.
3-stars grant 50% more.

traits.name: Inkshadow
traits.desc:
Gain unique Inkshadow items. Inkshadow champions gain 5% bonus damage and damage reduction.

Which Inkshadow items you get changes each game.

tiers.desc: An Inkshadow item (Different from each game)
An Inkshadow item (Different from each game), and 5% more bonus damage and damage reduction.
An Inkshadow item (Different from each game), and 15% more bonus damage and damage reduction.

traits.name: Invoker
traits.desc: Every 3 seconds, your units gain Mana.

tiers.desc: 20 Mana to Invokers; 5 Mana to others.
35 Mana to Invokers; 20 Mana to others.

Change which Lover takes the field depending on whether they are placed in the front or back 2 rows. When the fielded Lover casts, the other provides a bonus effect.

Front: Trickshot Xayah
Back: Altruist Rakan

traits.name: Mythic
traits.desc:
Mythic champions gain Health, Ability Power, and Attack Damage.

After 4 player combats, they become Epic, increasing the bonus by 50%.

tiers.desc: Instantly become Epic. The bonus is increased by 250% instead.

traits.name: Porcelain
traits.desc: After casting, Porcelain champions boil, gaining Attack Speed and taking less damage for 4 seconds.

tiers.desc: Reapers' Abilities can critically strike and they gain 25% Critical Strike Chance.
Additionally, Reapers bleed enemies for 50% bonus true damage over 2 seconds.

traits.name: Sage
traits.desc: Combat start: Allies in the front 2 rows gain Omnivamp. Allies in the back 2 rows gain Ability Power.

traits.name: Sniper
traits.desc:
Innate: Snipers gain 1 Attack Range.

Snipers deal more damage to targets farther away.

tiers.desc: 33% damage per hex. Snipers gain an additional 2 Attack Range.

The first time the Spirit Walker drops below 50% Health, he unleashes the rage within, healing to full Health, gaining increased movement speed, and changing his Ability from Ram Slam to Tiger Strikes.

traits.name: Storyweaver
traits.desc:
Storyweavers summon a Hero named Kayle and evolve her. Storyweavers gain max Health.

Each Storyweaver star level increases Kayle's Health and Ability Power. Kayle gets 15% Attack Speed for each game Stage.

traits.name: Trickshot
traits.desc: Trickshots' abilities ricochet. Each ricochet deals a percentage of the previous bounce's damage.

traits.name: Umbral
traits.desc:
The moon illuminates hexes, Shielding units placed in them at the start of combat.

Umbral units in illuminated hexes execute low Health enemies.

tiers.desc: 450 Shield; 18% Health execute. More hexes are illuminated
900 Shield; 25% Health execute. Illuminate the whole board
Executed enemies have a 100% chance to drop loot; 60% Health execute

traits.name: Warden
traits.desc: Wardens take less damage. For the first 10 seconds of combat, they take an additional 18% less damage.

traits.name: Bilgewater
traits.desc:
Your team's attacks and Abilities mark enemies. The mark stores a percentage of damage dealt to the enemy.

Marked enemies are struck by a cannonball after 1.5 seconds, dealing the stored damage plus a flat value as physical damage.

tiers.desc: 130 + 35% damage dealt. Every 20th cannonball is replaced with a treasure chest that drops gold!

traits.name: The Boss
traits.desc: Gain Boss Knuckles. When the holder first drops below 60% Health, they become The Boss and leave combat to start doing sit-ups. Each sit-up restores maximum Health and grants Attack Speed.

tiers.desc: 10% HP, 60% AS. If they reach full Health they return to combat Pumped Up: all of their attacks and abilities deal true damage.

traits.name: Coven
traits.desc:
The champion nearest to the center of your team is chosen as the Coven Leader, gaining bonus Ability Power.

Whenever your team casts an Ability, the Coven Leader gains Mana.

traits.name: Disco
traits.desc:
Summon a movable Disco Ball.

Combat start: Allies next to it gain Attack Speed and healing immediately and every 3 seconds.

tiers.desc: 2 Disco Balls, 15% AS and 4% max HP

traits.name: Elderwood
traits.desc: Every 2 seconds your team grows, gaining bonus stats. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

traits.name: Glacial
traits.desc: Gain a Glacial Mallet. Attacks from champions holding a mallet have a 25% chance to stun their target for 1 second and deal bonus magic damage.

tiers.desc: 400 magic damage. Gain 2 more Glacial Mallets.

traits.name: Hellion
traits.desc: When an allied champion dies, a Doppelhellion (a one less star copy) will leap from the Hellion portal and join the fight!

traits.name: Imperial
traits.desc: Combat start: select champions gain 50% bonus damage.

traits.name: Jazz
traits.desc: For each active trait (except uniques), your team gains bonus Health and deals bonus damage.

traits.name: LaserCorps
traits.desc: Your team gains laser drones. When a unit attacks or is hit by an attack, their drone deals magic damage to the target (0.4 second cooldown). Drones are reassigned to another ally on death.

tiers.desc: 25 magic damage. All units gain an additional drone.

traits.name: Mascot
traits.desc:
Your team heals percentage of their max Health every 2 seconds.

When a champion dies, they retreat to the sidelines to cheer on your team. Your team's healing increases for each cheering champion.

tiers.desc: 1.5% HP base, 1% HP per cheering champion
6% HP base, 1.5% HP per cheering champion

traits.name: Mech-Pilot
traits.desc:
Use the Pilot Selector to choose a Pilot. Combat start: the Pilot jumps into a Mech.

The Mech has the Traits and items of its Pilot, and gains a percent of the pilot's Attack Damage and max Health. When the Mech dies, the Pilot(s) are ejected with 45% of their max Health.

tiers.desc: Super-Mech: 55% AD/HP. The 2 nearest units to the Pilot also jump into the Mech.

traits.name: Mountain
traits.desc:
Gain 2 Mountain hexes in the front row.
Combat start: units standing on a Mountain hex gain a Shield and permanent bonus Health.

tiers.desc: 600 Shield, 60 HP. The entire front row becomes Mountain hexes.

traits.name: Phantom
traits.desc: Combat start: random enemies have their Health reduced.

tiers.desc: Set 1 enemy's Health to 30% maximum Health.

traits.name: Rebel
traits.desc: Combat start: for 10 seconds, your team gains a Shield and bonus damage for each adjacent ally.

traits.name: Shimmerscale
traits.desc: Gain Shimmerscale items. These items give gold as well as combat power.

tiers.desc: Gain Goldmancers Staff. At Stage 3-1 gain Draven's Axe.

traits.name: Shurima
traits.desc: Combat start: select champions Ascend and gain 25% maximum Health and 40% Attack Speed.

tiers.desc: The strongest champion Ascends after 8 seconds.

traits.name: Socialite
traits.desc:
Gain a spotlight hex.
Combat start: the unit standing in the spotlight gains bonus stats.

tiers.desc: 15% bonus damage and 5 Mana per second.
40% bonus damage, 5 Mana per second, and 15% Omnivamp. Gain another spotlight hex.

traits.name: Trainer
traits.desc: After combat, the 3 champions closest to Nomsy feed her 1 Snax per star level, adding Health and Ability Power. Nomsy's star level increases every 25 Snax!

traits.name: Yordle
traits.desc: After each player combat, a random 1, 2 or 3 cost champion that usually fits your team is added to your bench for free.

tiers.desc: If you have 5 or more 3 star champions, you instead gain a Yordle-Lord.
Yordle-Lord Veigar and his Furyhorns are crashing Pengu's Party!
